column4: Will 10.04 run properly on a 1.3ghz celeron M, with 512mb ram? (480 usable)
though desktop effects may not work, that depends on your Video RAM
That would be 32mb shared as ram is 512 but shows as ~480
I will just need compiz without the cube
I mean the memory of your graphic card. Is it shared?
If that's the case, then compiz should run fine without the cube. What is the graphic card manufacturer?

Actually I have been using it for a while (Karmic, Lucid and Maverick), but installing on someone else's laptop, Already got Xubuntu 9.10 on it as its ram was 256mb,but now I upgraded it to 512mb for Ubuntu
BTW is KDE better or Gnome for slower processors and ram?
I am not very sure, but I think GNOME
Hmm. THanks., I'll try lucid and hopefully it will be fine
